name: Red Baron
blurb: Red Baron is back! The best dogfighting flight sim of all time returns from Damon Slye, the original creator of Red Baron.

rewards.reward: SUPPORTER: Thank you for your Support. \r\n=============================\r\nYou will receive our heartfelt thanks and several digital download wallpapers.

CADET (LIMITED): Let the games begin!\r\n=============================\r\nYou will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers; and a limited edition insignia (your choice from a set of fifteen, only available to backers)

CADET: Let the games begin!\r\n=============================\r\nYou will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers; and a limited edition insignia (your choice from a set of fifteen, only available to backers)

WINGMAN (LIMITED): Beta Access unlocked!\r\n=============================\r\nYou will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers, TWO limited edition insignia's, a limited edition plane skin, and BETA ACCESS!

WINGMAN: Beta Access unlocked!\r\n=============================\r\nYou will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers, TWO limited edition insignia's, a limited edition plane skin, and BETA ACCESS!

SCOUT (LIMITED): Alpha Access unlocked!\r\n============================= You will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers, THREE limited edition insignia, TWO limited edition skins, and ALPHA ACCESS!

SCOUT: Alpha Access unlocked!\r\n============================= You will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers, THREE limited edition insignia, TWO limited edition skins, and ALPHA ACCESS!

PILOT (LIMITED):  Superb Value ============================= You will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers, FOUR limited edition insignia, FOUR limited edition skins, alpha access, a digital art book and a key for classic Red Baron Pack (which includes Red Baron Classic, Mission Builder, and Red Baron 3D).

PILOT: Superb Value ============================= You will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers, FOUR limited edition insignia's, FOUR limited edition skins, alpha access, a digital art book and a key for classic Red Baron (which includes Red Baron Classic, Mission Builder, and Red Baron 3D).

VETERAN PILOT: Cosmetic Dream ============================= You will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers and art book, FIVE limited edition insignia's, FIVE limited edition skins, alpha access, classic Red Baron pack, and EVERY STANDARD PLANE SKIN at launch.

EXPERT PILOT: Physical Rewards Unlocked! ============================= You will receive: The Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers and art book, SIX limited edition insignia's, SIX limited edition skins, alpha access, classic Red Baron pack, every standard plane skin, and a Red Baron poster of your choice.

FLIGHT LEADER: Double Dose + Signed Goods! ============================= You will receive: TWO COPIES of the Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers and art book,EIGHT limited edition insignia's, EIGHT limited edition skins, alpha access, classic Red Baron pack, every standard plane skin, and a Red Baron poster of your choice SIGNED by Damon Slye and the Red Baron team.

SQUADRON LEADER: Recognition unlocked + 4x the goods! ============================= You will receive: FOUR COPIES of the Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers and art book, TEN limited edition insignia's, TEN limited edition skins, alpha access, classic Red Baron pack, every standard plane skin, a signed Red Baron poster of your choice, and YOUR NAME in the credits as a supporter.

CAPTAIN: Go Down in History ============================= You will receive: four copies of the Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers and art book, ALL limited edition insignia's and plane skins, alpha access, classic Red Baron pack, every standard plane skin, a signed Red Baron poster of your choice, your name in the credits as a CONTRIBUTOR, and your name or user name used as flavor text somewhere in game.

ACE: Time to Design\r\n ============================= You will receive: FIVE COPIES of the Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers and art book, ALL limited edition insignia's and skins, alpha access, classic Red Baron pack, every standard plane skin, a signed Red Baron poster of your choice, your name in the credits as a contributor, your name used as flavor text somewhere in game, and you can help us DESIGN AN INSIGNIA.

DOUBLE ACE: Meet the Devs, leave your legacy ============================= You will receive: TEN COPIES of the Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers and art book, ALL limited edition insignia's and skins, alpha access, classic Red Baron pack, every standard plane skin, a signed Red Baron poster of your choice, your name in the credits as a contributor, your name used as flavor text, a PHONE CALL with the entire dev team , and you get to help us DESIGN A SKIN!

TRIPLE ACE: Face Time! ============================= You will receive: ten copies of the Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers and art book, ALL limited edition insignia's and skins, alpha access, classic Red Baron pack, every standard plane skin, a signed Red Baron poster of your choice, your name in the credits as a contributor, and a day and DINNER WITH THE TEAM where you will help DESIGN a SKIN and an INSIGNIA, and a MAP LANDMARK

ACE OF ACES: The full package ============================= You will receive: Ten copies of the Red Baron game; digital download wallpapers and art book, ALL limited edition insignia's and skins for ALL TEN of your game copies, alpha access, classic Red Baron pack, every standard plane skin for ALL TEN of your game copies, a signed Red Baron poster of your choice, your name in the credits as a PATRON, and a day and DINNER WITH THE TEAM where you will help DESIGN a SKIN, an UPGRADE, an INSIGNIA, and a MAP LANDMARK.
